product_name: Juvia's PlaceThe Coffee Shop Lip Gloss
summary: SummaryJuvia's Place The Coffee Shop Lip Gloss is a new generation of hydrating, creamy lip glosses that leave lips with an ultra-glassy shine and lasting hydration on lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsLasting hydration with superfood ingredientsSmooths LipsKey IngredientsCocoa ButterVitamin EItem 2606834IngredientsPolyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Water, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Microcrystalline Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Synthetic Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Colorant, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Aluminum Hydroxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 (CI 15850).

reviews.headline: Lip color
reviews.comments: I have been looking for this color or close to what I usually would wear.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again very smooth
reviews.comments: Love this brand

reviews.headline: Formulation
reviews.comments: Does not function properly as a lip gloss. The glossy aspect of this product, at least for the color I got, Cream de Cacao, is like an oil with pigment that does not go on evenly. You can manipulate it to even it out but it does not stay that way because it absorbs into the lips. It moisturizes I suppose, but no shine is left, and it absorbs quickly, within an hour. There is pigment left behind on the lips but not the color Cream de Cacao promises. Its like a bright/medium pink instead of its initial light pink. Very strange product, could maybe be marketed as an oil stain, but I am disappointed in this as a lip gloss.

reviews.headline: Kenyan Koffee!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the color Kenyan Koffee. It's the color I've been looking for, just never knew how to describe it until I saw it. If they ever discontinue it, I may need to buy one just to keep for comparison so I can find a color like it because it's perfect for my medium brown skin.

reviews.headline: Love this lipgloss
reviews.comments: I Love all of Juvia's products

reviews.headline: Love the creamy texture
reviews.comments: Love the creamy texture and the colors. wish it would stay on my lips longer tho.  Ive worn this color for more than a year and it's my go to.....

reviews.headline: I absolutely love it!!
reviews.comments: When I first bought this lipgloss, I thought it was going to have a bright nude look. It's literally just glossy with a little nude color. I love it thought, it smells just like toffee!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I like the way this product feel and the way it look.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Very juice and i like color

reviews.headline: More of a lipstick
reviews.comments: This lip gloss goes on smooth. Has a nice scent to it not chemically.  The pigment is perfect.But the only negative would be that it is more of a lipstick than a lip gloss.  It drys to a matte finish and doesn't stay glossy for too long.

reviews.headline: It was ok!!
reviews.comments: So I genuinely wanted to love this product. I was given it as a gift recently in the shade chocolate drip and i didnt think it would be as pigmented as it was, so thats a plus. However, just like the volumizing gloss sticks, the pigment only lasted an hour on my lips, without a liner or lipstick‚Ä¶.. whats the point of this product if we cant wear it alone ? Despite it being highly pigmented, it was so blotchy and that was a turn off for me. For the 3 hours i had it on, i didnt eat nor drink anything at all, and yet the color not only vanished, it ran out the corners of my lips and had me looking crazy. I wish most people would give honest reviews after using a product for a while, rather than try it on for no more than 30 minutes and run to make reviews asap. The colors are beautiful and pigmented but just dont last long on plain lips.

reviews.headline: I love Juvia's Place
reviews.comments: I love this shade, it's my everyday lipgloss.

reviews.headline: Worth buying
reviews.comments: This lipgloss os amazing. It smells like coffee. Whats great about this lipgloss is that it us not sticky on the lips.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: Beautiful lip color

reviews.headline: Sophisticated
reviews.comments: I never been into shining gloss especially after hitting 40...I thought I'll give brown sugar a try and love it... Moisturizer and shine with a sophisticated look
